attributes.action: make bonsai kittens(kittens that have been put in glass bottles alive as a ornament)illegal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bonsai kittens are when people put a kitten in a glass bottle as a ornament soon after its birth while it is still alive after giving it muscel relaxation and put little holes in the side so it can breath and feed it through a straw.

rejection.details: The Bonsai Kittens website is a spoof / hoax.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
